title: Task-Manager
description: A React-based task management dashboard with Redux and MUI, enabling task creation, editing, filtering, and prioritization.

title: Budget-Tracker
description: The Budget Tracker is a React app with Redux and MUI for tracking, categorizing, and visualizing finances efficiently.

title: Blog-Post
description: The Blog Posting App is a MERN stack application with Redux and MUI for creating, managing, and displaying blog posts efficiently
